text: 33:2 Godɨn Araziba 18:9; 2 Eghaghaniba 28:3; Jeremaia 15:4Manase arazir aghuimɨn gɨn zuir pu. Puvatɨ. A gumazamizir igharazir fomɨra nguazir kamɨn ikezibar arazir mɨzɨrɨzir kurabar gɨn zuima, Ikiavɨra Itir God me batuegha, nguazir kam isa Israelia ganɨngi. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Manase Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn arazir kabagh ami, kar arazir Godɨn damazimɨn derazir puvatɨziba.
